title: The Farm
description: You are a simple farmhand armed only with a pitchfork. A messenger arrives, begging you to rescue the kidnapped princess from the Lich King.

title: Wooded Path
description: A peaceful path winds through the trees. Birds sing, but danger lurks beyond.

title: Spooky Forest
description: The air grows cold. A massive spider web blocks your way deeper into the woods.

title: Abandoned Cabin
baseDescription: Inside the dusty cabin, broken furniture litters the floor and cobwebs hang from the ceiling.

matches.name: Matches
matches.description: You discover a box of matches.

title: Forest Clearing
baseDescription: A peaceful glade surrounded by trees. The ground is dry and covered in fallen branches.

sticks.name: Sticks
sticks.description: You find a pile of dry sticks that look perfect for kindling.

title: Burning the Web
description: You place the sticks at the base of the web and use the matches to ignite them. The web burns away, clearing your path.

title: Spider Ambush
description: A giant spider leaps from above! You try to fight with your pitchfork.

title: Spider Defeated
description: You manage to stab the spider and escape. You press on.

title: Ashen Wastes
description: You enter a scorched land where the sun is hidden and the ground burns.

title: Trap: Lava Pit
description: The trail ends suddenly. You fall into a pit of lava.

title: Citadel Gates
description: You arrive at the obsidian gates of the Lich King's citadel. Evil magic hums in the air.

title: The Marble Hallway
description: You creep down a marble hallway echoing with ancient whispers. A distant clatter of bone-on-metal rings from the shadows.

title: Throne Room
description: You defeat the skeleton and burst into the throne room. The princess is chained beside the Lich King!

title: Victory
description: With courage and luck, you slay the Lich King. The princess is saved!

title: The Chains of Power
description: As you reach for the magical chains, the Lich King unleashes a torrent of void magic. The raw energy consumes everything in its path, killing you both in a blinding flash.

title: Venomous End
baseDescription: As you flee from the monstrous spider, it lunges forward with terrifying speed. You feel a sharp sting in your leg - its poison fangs have sunk deep into your flesh.

title: Skeleton Warrior
description: A skeleton warrior emerges from the darkness, clad in rusted armor and wielding a chipped sword. Its eyeless skull seems to glare at you with malice.

title: Struck Down
description: As you turn to flee, the skeleton rushes forward with unnatural speed. Its ancient blade pierces your back, and darkness quickly takes you.
